articles.title: Greetings to Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guinean President
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Alpha Conde, president of Guinea, on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of its independence.
					Expressing belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields, the message sincerely wished the president and people of Guinea greater successes in the work for peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Sinuiju Youth Railway Station Remodeled
articles.content:
Sinuiju Youth Railway Station Remodeled
 Sinuiju, October 2 (KCNA) -- Looks of Sinuiju Youth Railway Station in North Phyongan Province have undergone a radical change.
					 An arch-style shop for passengers, two-storied hall for guests' entrance and exit, underground crossing and others were newly built to add glory to the leadership feats performed by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and provide the convenience to passengers.

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Made by DPRK Universities
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Made by DPRK Universities
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Universities in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have made signal achievements in scientific research.
					Kim Il Sung University succeeded in developing experimental apparatuses and programs for archeological examination.
					
					The university also developed new aqueous solution, coating material and desiccant, which help increase the rate of rooting and growth of trees.
					
					Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University invented a new bionic method of treating myocardial infraction.
					
					Kim Chaek University of Technology completed a new welding technology, that helps ensure safety of structures, and put the packing process on an unmanned basis at the Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory.
					
					Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering established a new process of making bricks with ashes of lignite gasification.
					
					University of Sciences developed a new agent controlling the growth of crops to be conducive to increased bean production.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday devotes an article to the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung". 
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), says that the work serves as the great immortal programme as it reflects the unshakable faith and will of Kim Jong Il to develop the WPK into the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung by firmly upholding his idea and feats in party building as unshakable guidelines.
					
					 The two decades since the publication of the work represent the sacred annals in which the WPK has successfully carried forward the idea and cause of the great leaders, the article says, adding:
					
					 A revolutionary party should establish the ideological system of the leader and leadership system and should be built and developed into his party in which its whole membership is united close around him.
					
					 The greatest feats Kim Jong Il performed in the history of Juche-oriented party building lie in that he laid an eternal foundation for glorifying the WPK as the eternal party of the leader.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who conducted party building and activities as intended by the President and the way he did even under the complicated world political situation, the revolutionary character of the WPK as the party of the leader has been invariably preserved.
					
					 The harmonious whole of the WPK and the Korean people has been cemented as an invincible bulwark and absolute are the support and trust of all service personnel and people in the mother party built by the great leaders.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Anti-DPRK Remarks at UN Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Anti-DPRK Remarks at UN Assailed
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive in a "keynote address" at the 70th UN General Assembly shortly ago groundlessly took issue with the DPRK again.
					 She said the "north's nuclear weapons are a top priority task for building a world without nuclear weapons" and even talked about "additional provocation," claiming it "hamstrings the efforts for the resumption of dialogue." She even cried out for "reform and opening."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says what she uttered reveals a foolish trick to build up public opinion critical of the DPRK and elicit international pressure for isolating and stifling it at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities are harassers of peace and nuclear war maniacs as they have persistently stood in the way of settling the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula and improving the north-south relations and escalated tension by posing constant nuclear threats to the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 We do not hide that we are bolstering up the nuclear deterrence for self-defence to firmly defend peace of the country and the destiny of the nation from the U.S. moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The status of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state will remain unchanged no matter what others may say.
					
					 It is foolhardy for the south Korean authorities to try to get something by kowtowing to outsiders.
					
					 They should stop going reckless, seriously pondering over the serious consequences to be entailed by their act of pushing the situation to a catastrophe again by acting as a puppet of the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The north-south relations can never be mended nor dialogue and cooperation can properly take place as long as the south Korean ruling forces are allowed to kick up the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket aimed at hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK and inciting distrust and confrontation between the north and the south, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The above-said racket is a traitorous act of zealously following the U.S. aggression moves to hurt the ideology and social system of the DPRK and an intolerable anti-reunification act of preventing the national reconciliation and unity and the improvement of the north-south relations, the article notes.
					
					 Terming this a vivid manifestation of the foolish scenario for achieving "unification of social systems", the article goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' malignant mud-slandering at the most dignified socialist system of the DPRK over its non-existent "human rights" issue is a criminal act of pushing the north-south relations to a catastrophe and a challenge to the unanimous desire of the entire nation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity. It is, therefore, absolutely intolerable.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces have to deeply cogitate about catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					
					 We value national concord and the improvement of the north-south relations but will never tolerate any act of infringing upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: Objective Assessment of Validity of DPRK's Access to Nuclear Weapons: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Objective Assessment of Validity of DPRK's Access to Nuclear Weapons: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The British magazine The Week in a recent article said that the north's access to nuclear weapons plays the role of a shield deterring the U.S. from attacking north Korea, asserting that the DPRK's option was right in the light of the deplorable situation in Mid-east countries. 
					 The magazine said that after the September 11 incident the U.S. attacked Iraq, Afghanistan, Libya, Yemen, Somalia and other countries, but not North Korea as it is possessed of nuclear weapons.
					
					 This can not but be an objective estimation of the justice of the DPRK's possession of nuclear weapons that was prompted by the constant nuclear threat and threat of military aggression from the U.S.
					
					 As known, the worldwide Cold-War has lasted for the past seven decades and wars, big or small, broke out in various regions but not in nuclear weapons states.
					
					 In the past nuclear powers including the U.S. committed indiscriminate interference in the internal affairs and arbitrary practices against non nuclear states by abusing the partial international political structure.
					
					 Those countries that sought to bolster capability for self-defence and have access to nuclear deterrence were subject to threat and blackmail through military pressure and economic sanctions. In the meantime, they were taken in by economic aid and propaganda for rapprochement.
					
					 Even before the Iraqi war, the U.S. pressurized Iraq into destroying military hardware and facilities including missiles that formed the core of its armed forces. Then the U.S. started the war and swallowed Iraq up.
					
					 Libya scrapped its decades-old nuclear program, pinning hope on big powers and yielding to their pressure and appeasement, and abandoned its nuclear deterrence. In the end it fell victim to aggression. The tragic situation of several countries including Libya teaches a serious lesson.
					
					 Some countries on the Balkans and in Mideast fell victim to the interference in internal affairs and aggression by the U.S. and other Western forces because they neglected the work of increasing the defence capability.
					
					 If a country is weak, it can not protect its sovereignty and dignity nor can it achieve the people's happiness and prosperity.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces are now loudly speaking of denuclearization, while getting busy to realize international cooperation in stand-off with the DPRK.
					
					 Their last-ditch efforts to force the DPRK to scrap its nuclear deterrence clearly prove that the nuclear deterrence is the best means for defence that guarantees peaceful environment and stable conditions for the development and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. is to force the DPRK to dismantle its nukes and overthrow its social system by employing every possible means and methods.
					
					 The hostile forces have to clearly understand that the DPRK is neither Iraq nor Libya.
					
					 The measures for bolstering up its military muscle, a legitimate right to self-defence, will remain unchanged no matter what others may say and no matter how the situation may change.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will hold more tightly the treasured sword of nuclear weapons and pave a wide avenue to prosperity in the face of the U.S. imperialists' ever-increasing moves for military pressure, blockade, appeasement and deception.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to bolster its nuclear deterrence for self-defence unless the U.S. rolls back its outdated hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Polish Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Polish Organization
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" on its homepage on September 28.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), serves as a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK that paved a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and indicates the way for developing the WPK into the eternal party of the President.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Ecuadorian Figures
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Ecuadorian Figures
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with floral baskets by the chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il  who doubles as chairman of the Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its secretary general, the chairman of the  Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification and the director general of the Television Station Tele Andina 23  of Ecuador on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 The floral baskets were conveyed to the head of the cooperation group of the Korean Koryo medicine working in Ecuador on Sept. 24.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party-building Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party-building Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Seminars held by the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and branch groups under the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on September 23 and 24 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The chairman of the preparatory committee of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK said:
					
					 The WPK is an invincible party shining with the august names of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people.
					
					 After succeeding to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il steadily increased the leadership role of the WPK and turned the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher by powerfully arousing the army and people to the construction of a thriving socialist nation even under the grave situation where the imperialists focused the anti-socialist offensive against the DPRK, taking advantage of the frustration of socialism in different countries.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the most powerful revolutionary party and a mother party taking responsible care of the people's destiny to the last. This was the greatest exploits performed by them.
					
					 Speakers including the chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that the idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on party-building and their exploits are shedding more shining rays thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Holidays in October Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays in October Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 70th anniversary of its founding.
					 They included a seminar in Benin, lecture and photo exhibition in Guinea, book exhibition in Nigeria and round-table talks in Ethiopia from September 22 to 25.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un performed by building and leading the party.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Present there were personages of different circles and people in relevant countries.
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the dignified party deeply rooted among the popular masses and absolutely supported by them.
					
					 They frustrated the imperialist allied forces' offensive for stifling the DPRK by dint of Songun and ushered in a new era of building a thriving socialist nation, he stressed.

articles.title: Serbian Political Figure Lauds WPK's History
articles.content:
Serbian Political Figure Lauds WPK's History
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, posted an article on its website on September 25 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 In an article titled "70 year-long history of Workers' Party of Korea" the general secretary said:
					
					 The WPK was founded by President Kim Il Sung on October 10, 1945.
					
					 It has made shining achievements startling the world for the past seven decades and the service personnel and people of the DPRK firmly defended the socialist cause, united close around leader Kim Jong Il and the WPK even at a time when socialism collapsed in different countries at the end of the last century.
					
					 It would be unthinkable apart from the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il that the WPK led the army and people to victory while weathering out the ordeals of history and resolutely foiling the U.S. aggression moves.
					
					 Our party pays high tribute to the WPK which has created the history of victory and miracles for the past 70 years, expressing belief that the Korean people would achieve the reunification of the country and the cause of building a thriving nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Our party will as ever extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause.

articles.title: Nigerian, Peruvian Bodies Mark Birthday of WPK
articles.content:
Nigerian, Peruvian Bodies Mark Birthday of WPK
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Peruvian organizations posted articles on their websites on September 22 and 25 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in an article titled "Workers' Party of Korea demonstrates its might as an invincible party" said:
					
					 The WPK has demonstrated its dignity as an invincible party in the international community.
					
					 It has registered only victories despite the stern test of history for the past seven decades since its founding on Oct. 10, 1945. What was the secret of its invincibility? Firstly, it was its guiding idea, Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Secondly, it was the unity and cohesion of the whole party.
					
					 The WPK grew strong to be an invincible party under the guidance of Kim Jong Il who carried forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Thirdly, it was the people's absolute support and trust in the party.
					
					 What should be particularly mentioned as regards its invincibility is that the WPK has been guided by the great leaders.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits for the development of the WPK.
					
					 It is now demonstrating its invincible might under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship also posted articles titled "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "Great leader of the mother party" lauding the undying feats of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un for the development of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente guineo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente guineo
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion a Alpha Conde, presidente de la Republica de Guinea, en ocasion del 57o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais africano.
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises con larga tradicion historica se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas en varios dominios y desea de todo corazon al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en las responsabilidades para la paz y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Reconstruida Estacion Juventud de Sinuiju
articles.content:
Reconstruida Estacion Juventud de Sinuiju
Sinuiju, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo reconstruida la Estacion Juventud de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					 Al  construirse de nuevo la tienda abovedada para pasajeros, el hall de dos pisos para la salida y entrada de huespedes, el cruce subterraneo, etc., es posible glorificar mas las hazanas de direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu y asegurar en alto nivel la comodidad de los pasajeros.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Mientras siga la campana de "DDHH" de los gobernantes surcoreanos que calumnia la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y agrava la desconfianza y la confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas, no se mejoraran las relaciones intercoreanas ni se realizara merecidamente el dialogo y cooperacion. 
					Insiste asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este viernes y continua:
					
					La campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de los gobernantes surcoreanos resulta el acto criminal antinacional que obedece a las maniobras de agresion de EE.UU. tendentes a difamar la ideologia y el regimen de la RPDC, y tambien es el proceder anti-reunificacion para impedir la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Igualmente, deviene una expresion de ambicion vana de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					El intento de las autoridades surcoreanas de calumniar el mas prestigioso regimen socialista de la RPDC en el tema de "derechos humanos" lleva a la ruptura irreparable las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y desafia a la unanime aspiracion de la nacion a la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					Los gobernantes surcoreanos deben reflexionar seriamente sobre la consecuencia catastrofica de su campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					Apreciamos la reconciliacion nacional y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, pero no toleraremos nunca el intento de infringir nuestra dignidad y soberania.

articles.title: Evaluacion objetiva sobre posesion de armas nucleares de RPDC, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Evaluacion objetiva sobre posesion de armas nucleares de RPDC, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- La revista britanica The Week reporta que la posesion de armas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cumple el papel de escudo para impedir el ataque de Estados Unidos y agrega que tomando en consideracion la situacion tragica de los paises del Medio Oriente, es muy justa la opcion de la RPDC. 
					Y destaca que despues del incidente del 11 de septiembre, EE.UU. perpetro el ataque armado contra Iraq, Afganistan, Libia, Yemen, Somalia y otros paises, pero no lo hizo en cuanto a la RPDC, pais con armas nucleares.
					
					Esto es la estimacion objetiva sobre la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC generada frente a la ininterrumpida amenaza nuclear y de agresion militar de EE.UU. 
					
					Como es conocido por todos, durante 70 anos pasados surgio la guerra fria en escala mundial y estallaron muchas guerras en varias regiones, excepto a los paises con armas nucleares.
					
					En el tiempo pasado, abusando de la injusta estructura politica internacional, EE.UU. y otras potencias nucleares cometieron indiscriminadamente la intervencion en los asuntos internos y las arbitrariedades contra los paises desnuclearizados. 
					
					Amenazan y chantajean con presion militar y sancion economica a los paises que fortalecen la capacidad de autodefensa nacional y se esfuerzan por tener el disuasivo nuclear, y al mismo tiempo, les concilian o enganan hablando de la ayuda economica y la recuperacion de las relaciones. 
					
					Antes del inicio de la guerra iraqui, EE.UU. hizo que los iraquies destruyeran con sus propias manos los misiles y otros pertrechos y establecimientos belicos de su pais y despues, desato la guerra y ocupo Iraq.
					
					Libia y otros paises tambien abandonaron el programa nuclear que promovian durante varios decenios y hasta el disuasivo de guerra, depositando la esperanza en las potencias y arrodillandose ante la presion y adormecimiento de ellas. Como resultado, se hicieron victimas de agresion, lo que nos da una seria leccion. 
					
					Por haber despreciado el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional, algunos paises de la Peninsula Balcanica y del Medio Oriente se convirtieron en el blanco de la intervencion en los asuntos internos y agresion de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas occidentales. 
					
					Un pais debil no puede defender la soberania y dignidad nacionales ni lograr la felicidad y prosperidad del pueblo. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles se desesperan por lograr la cooperacion internacional anti-RPDC hablando ruidosamente de la desnuclearizacion y censurando el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC. 
					
					El hecho comprueba que el disuasivo nuclear es el optimo remedio para asegurar el ambiente pacifico y las condiciones estables por el desarrollo y prosperidad del pais y la nacion. 
					
					La verdadera intencion de EE.UU. es lograr el desarme nuclear y el derrocamiento de la RPDC valiendose de todos los metodos y medios. 
					
					Las fuerzas hostiles deben tener presente que la RPDC no es igual a Iraq y Libia. 
					
					Cuanto mas se intensifiquen la presion militar, el bloqueo, el adormecimiento y engano de EE.UU., mas consolidaran nuestro ejercito y pueblo el disuasivo nuclear y abriran el ancho camino por la prosperidad nacional.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. no retire su politica hostil anti-RPDC, se intensificara sin cesar nuestro disuasivo de guerra de caracter autodefensivo.
